segments.text: I'm now looking at the children, off to the center-left of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is climbing on a two-step stool, which looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His legs are splayed out, and the stool is tilted, almost ready to tip backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open upper cabinet where a "COOKIE JAR" is labeled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, he's definitely got his hand in there, grabbing cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's even holding a plate with his other hand, perhaps to catch his illicit treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands nearby, looking up at him with such an expectant face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her arm is raised, palm open, clearly waiting for her share of the spoils.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their secret mission, completely oblivious to the rising water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of their teamwork in mischief is rather amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't give way under the boy's weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a daring feat for such a young child.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are breaking a social rule, but their innocent joy is almost infectious.
segments.speaker: PAR
